Body:
cron = doccron.cron('0 10 1 2-8 * *')
next_datetime = datetime.now(tz=tzlocal()).replace(day=1, hour=10, minute=0,
    second=0, microsecond=0)
while True:
    if next_datetime.month in range(2, 9
        ) and next_datetime.day == 1 and next_datetime > datetime.now(tz=
        tzlocal()):
        break
    next_datetime += timedelta(days=1)
next_schedule = next(cron)
assert isinstance(next_schedule, datetime)
assert next_schedule == next_datetime
